thread.title: Would Definitely Stay Here Again
thread.title_full: Would Definitely Stay Here Again - Review of Hilton Garden Inn Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: R_Seagle
title: Would Definitely Stay Here Again
text: We found the hotel to be clean, the staff to be courteous and the location convenient to Times Square and the theater district. Highly recommend king corner room with pull out sofa for a small family. Housekeeping was excellent and friendly. Only complaint was that the front desk would never answer a call...not would guest services... the one morning that I attempted calling.
